allowCrossTaskView: Allow performers to view tasks across.
allowLinkingSubtasksToParent: Allow performers to link subtasks between each other, so they can see other linked subtasks under the same parent task.
allowCrossTaskViewers: Allow participants to view tasks across.
allowParticipantsToViewLinkedSubtasks: Allow participants to link subtasks between each other, so they can see other linked subtasks under the same parent task.
autoTransitionOnStartDate: Automatically change the task status when the start date is reached.
